title: I can't submit a request in supprot!
body:
When i'm trying to submit request the system wants me log in. But i am already IN.
How should i use support, when i can't do this.
Answer me, Riot, pls???

replies.body: If you haven't yet try logging out and back in to see if it corrects itself, and if not you can always shoot support an email through support@riotgames.com
